title: navigation to wbc.mlb.com/login redirects to XML page
custom_preconds: GIVEN WBC user exists
custom_steps: WHEN user directly navigating to the /login page
custom_expected: THEN user shouldn't get an XML page. User should be navigate to correct landing page.

title: As a BOC Admin or Federation Admin, I want to add a prospective player to my list by using their EBIS ID so that they appear on my prospective player list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin or Federation Admin

Designs
Prospective Players: https://zpl.io/VOx9Ndl
Creating an EBIS Player: https://zpl.io/aw6BoqN
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to Prospective Player List | Add New Player Form
AND the EBIS radio button is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the EBIS ID field becomes white
AND the system will confirm the field has a value before enabling the create player button

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the ability to see and manage my prospective player lists.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-11

Design
https://zpl.io/aMpOK5o
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Prospective Players page
custom_expected:
THEN a BOC admin will have a dropdown that allows them to switch between Federation teams.
AND the dropdown should only display teams that have been added to a tournament via the manage tournament screen.
AND the countries will be sorted in the dropdown by alpha descending
AND there will be a search bar. Typing the name of a user will filter the list with relevant results.
AND show a list of all prospective players for the selected federation. Each player will have the following columns.
-An "add" icon which will add the player to the federation interest list roster stage (for this story, this button has no action)
-Last name
-First name
-Ext Last
-Middle Name
-Pos
-Bats/Throws
-Org
-Club
-Ebis ID
-IL Days
-40 man flag
-Birth Date
-Birth Country

title: As a Federation User, I want the ability to view a profile so that I can see the information about a specific player.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Fed Team

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-51

Data Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/BES/Data+Discovery

Designs:
Ebis Player: https://zpl.io/brMyMMe
Non-ebis player: https://zpl.io/aNDkDWD
Unsaved Changes UX: https://zpl.io/brMkBAO
Saving Changes UX: https://zpl.io/V45xLD4
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a player profile
custom_expected:
THEN the profile will have four sections and respective fields
AND when the form is clean, the save and cancel buttons are greyed out.
AND when the form is dirty, the save and cancel buttons are active. 
AND when the form is dirty, display an asterisk icon next to the info tab.
AND all fields are required EXCEPT org and club name.

title: Create post-login actions
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC admin, Federation Team Adminstrator and Federation Team User account exist
custom_steps: WHEN user logs into WBC using those account
custom_expected:
THEN user should be redirected to the most relevant page after logging in: 
-BOC Admin - redirect to federation teams page (https://zpl.io/29KlnJd)
-Federation Team Adminstrator - redirect to prospective players list for the assigned team (https://zpl.io/aMpOK5o)
-Federation Team User (read only) - redirect to prospective players list for the assigned team (https://zpl.io/aMpOK5o)

title: Set up permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC admin, Federation Team Adminstrator and Federation Team User account exist
custom_steps: WHEN user logs into WBC using those account
custom_expected:
THEN they should each have following permission: 
-BOC Admin - access to all features
-Federation Team Adminstrator - access to features pertaining to a single assigned federation
-Federation Team User (read only) - read only access to roster functions for a single federation.

title: Create Login Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user navigates to WBC Site

Design: https://zpl.io/bA7KLyx
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to log into WBC
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to log in if the user has valid permission 
BUT if the user doesn't have valid permission they shouldn't be allowed to log in
AND proper error message should trigger

title: Create settings page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC Administrator user has proper permission

h2.Wireframe
https://zpl.io/aw6oonM
custom_steps: WHEN BOC Administrator logs into WBC
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a left nav item with a cog icon that links to the settings page.
AND page header should say "System Settings"
AND A disabled save and cancel button should be available 
AND The settings page will have a dropdown to allow switching between tournament years.
AND By default, system should show the current year tournament settings.
AND When a new tournament is created, the settings from the prior tournament should be carried over to the new tournament.

title: Firefox does not correctly display login page
custom_preconds: GIVEN WBC Site exists
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to http://wbcdev.mlb.com in FF
custom_expected: THEN user should be taken to right landing page not Blank page.

title: Display teams in grid on Tournament Management Page after they are added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user logs into WBC

Design: https://zpl.io/amdRoP9
custom_steps: WHEN user adds Team
custom_expected:
THEN display them in the appropriate section of the federation teams page (qualifying or main tournament)
AND Display the team name and their flag
AND Display a delete icon for each team
AND For teams in the qualifying tournament, display an arrow icon. The arrow icon should move the team to the main tournament.
AND Teams in the main tournament should have only a delete icon, no arrow.

title: Tournament management page
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC Administrator logs into WBC
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the top Nav tab called 'Federation Teams'
Design: https://zpl.io/amdRoP9
custom_expected:
THEN user should be taken to Federation Teams page
AND the federation teams page will be broken out into two sections, one for the qualifying tournament and one for the main tournament.
AND Each section will have an "Add Teams" button. (Functionality to follow.)
AND This page is associated with a specific tournament year. 2021 will have a unique teams page vs. 2025, etc.
AND This page and tab are only visible to BOC administrators.

title: Creating the environment indicator (dev/stg/prod)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user goes to WBC portal

https://zpl.io/adX8B8K
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs into WBC DEV/STG/PROD
custom_expected: THEN display the appropriate environment indicator depending on if the user is in DEV/STG/PROD(PROD has no indicator)

title: Create version indicator
custom_preconds: GIVEN user logs into WBC portal
custom_steps: WHEN user mouses over the logo
custom_expected: THEN display the commit ID in a box so user know what version of code has been deployed.

title: Create Prospective Players Nav Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs into WBC
custom_steps: WHEN user click on Prospect Player tab
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to to access the prospective players page so that they can view prospective players list.
AND The tab should be visible to all user roles

title: As a Federation Admin or Federation User, I want the ability to see and manage my prospective player lists.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as Fed Amin or Fed Team
AND has access to Prospective Players page

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-11

Design
https://zpl.io/aMpOK5o
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Prospective Players Page
custom_expected:
THEN there will see a search bar. Typing the name of a user will filter the list with relevant results.
AND have a list of all prospective players for that federation. Each player will have the following columns.
-an "Add" icon which will add the player to the federation interest list roster stage
-Last name
-First name
-Ext Last
-Middle Name
-Pos
-Bats/Throws
-Org
-Club
-Ebis ID
-IL Days
-40 man flag
-Birth Date
-Birth Country

title: As a user I would like the ability to reset my password if I forget it.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the WBC Login Page

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-46

Wireframe: 
https://zpl.io/VYok8BJ
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks "Forgot Password?"
custom_expected:
THEN replace the username and password fields with a field for email address.
AND above the field, display the text "Enter your email address to reset your password."
AND under the email field, display two buttons
--Submit: Submits the form
--Cancel: Resets the form back to the log in form
AND when the user clicks Submit, check to see if it is a valid email address
-If the email address is valid, show the user their secret question with header text above it saying "Security Question"
-If the email address is not found, display the following error message to the user "There is no record of the user: [email address].
AND underneath the security question answer field, display two buttons
--Submit: submits the secret question answer for validation
--Cancel: resets the form back to the forgot password state where the user can enter an email address
AND when the user submits the form
-if the secret answer is valid proceed to the set new password form
-if the secret answer is invalid, display the message "Answer does not match
For assistance with your logon credentials if you cannot remember your password secret answer, please contact ebissupport@mlb.com."
AND when the security question is answered, display two password fields 
-password
-confirm password
AND display two buttons
--Submit - submits the form to reset the password. 
--Cancel - reset the form back to the prior state for the user to enter their secret question answer
AND if the passwords match, display a message to the user "Your password has been changed. Return to the login page. " 
AND set the form back to the username/password login state
BUT if the passwords don't match or are otherwise invalid, display an error message to the user.

title: As any user, I want to see a player profile so that I can get full information on a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into WBC

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-39

Design:
https://zpl.io/brMyMMe
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to a player profile page
custom_expected:
THEN the page will have two tabs
--Info
--History
AND to access a player profile, the player name should be linked from the prospective player page.

title: As a BOC admin or Federation Admin, I want the ability to view and edit a player profile so that their information is always up to date.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC or Fed Admin

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-51

Data Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/BES/Data+Discovery

Designs:
Ebis Player: https://zpl.io/brMyMMe
Non-ebis player: https://zpl.io/aNDkDWD
Unsaved Changes UX: https://zpl.io/brMkBAO
Saving Changes UX: https://zpl.io/V45xLD4
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a player profile
custom_expected:
THEN the profile will have four sections and respective fields
AND when the form is clean, the save and cancel buttons are greyed out.
AND when the form is dirty, the save and cancel buttons are active. 
AND when the form is dirty, display an asterisk icon next to the info tab.
AND all fields are required EXCEPT org and club name.
AND only BOC admin will see a dropdown which will enable them to switch back and forth between
 views if the player is on the prospective player list of multiple teams

title: As a BOC administrator or Federation Administrator, I want to add players to my prospective players list on an individual basis.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin or Fed Amin

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-28

Design:
https://zpl.io/VQvxmRW
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Prospective Player screen
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "New Player" form
AND the form will have two radio buttons with separate functionality
AND in method one First name, last name, birth country, and DOB will be required fields
AND in method two EBIS ID will be a required field
AND the form will have a create player button that will be disabled until all required fields have been entered

title: As a BOC Admin or Federation Admin, I want to add a prospective player to my list by using their name, date of birth and birth country so that they appear on my prospective player list.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC or Fed Admin

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-35
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Prospective Players page
AND selecting the first radio button containing first/last/dob/country
custom_expected:
THEN the field background color will be white
AND all fields must have values before enabling the "Create Player" button
AND a matching check against the list of players in the WBC player database will be performed
AND there will be a Player match against this federation's player list
AND there will be a player match modal for this federation https://zpl.io/aMRKekN with 3 options:
--clicking interest list adds the matched profile to the team's interest list
--clicking "Continue Creating New Player" will take them to a profile form to continue adding the player. Name, DOB, birth country should be pre-filled.
--clicking cancel closes the modal
AND there will be a Player match against another federation's player list
AND there will be a player match modal for other federation players https://zpl.io/anLdxNl with 3 options:
--clicking Create Profile will create a new version of that players profile for the federation and take them to the profile to continue creating their version of the player.
--clicking Continue Creating New Player will take them to a profile form to continue adding the player. Name, DOB, birth country should be pre-filled.
--clicking cancel closes the modal

title: As a BOC Admin or Federation Admin, I want to know when a player I am adding matches a player that already exists in a federation team's prospective player list so that I do not create an additional profile.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC or Fed Admin

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-36

Design:
Player on own federation list: https://zpl.io/aMRKekN
Player on other federation’s list: https://zpl.io/anLdxNl
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Prospective Players page
AND adding a player
custom_expected:
THEN the data entered will be checked against the WBC player database.
AND there will be two types of matches
--Match vs. this team's list
--Match vs. other team's player list
AND if there is a match, display the matching modal
AND the modals header will display "The info entered matches existing player(s)
AND the following columns will be displayed:
--field names
--"You Entered"
--"System Match" with an Interest list icon (for each matched profile)
AND the following data will be displayed
--Last name, first name
--Ext Last
--Middle
--Birth Country
--Birth Date
--Federations (for other team matching only)
AND clicking "No, continue creating player" will take the user to the profile page to fill out the form.
AND clicking "Cancel" will close the matching window.

title: UI Styling Updates
custom_preconds:
Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-53
custom_steps:
* Logo: The blue part of the pinwheel should line up with the bottom of the top nav
* The left nav and top subnav color should be #1e376d
* The left and top nav are missing the box-shadows.  Note: the box-shadow settings for each are different.
* Clicking the user dropdown for the first time doesn’t work, only works on second click(this was an issue in other projects)
* There looks to be a container div with a background color set to white that’s unnecessary.  The scrollbar panes are also showing on this div.  It’s most obvious in the tournaments section of the app right now.
* The page borders in the app should be #d2d2d2, see federation teams page for example. 
* Styling of disable buttons is incorrect (see settings page)
* Size of the header buttons is incorrect
*  The settings and trophy icon color should be #0083c0

title: As a WBC user I want to know something is happening after clicking the login button.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the login page

Story:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-44

Wireframe:
Button spinner example: https://zpl.io/V45xLD4
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Login
custom_expected: THEN they should be brought into the app and see a page spinner until the content is loaded
